SUCCESS_MESSAGES.FORGOT_PASSWORD: If a account is registered with this email address, you should get an email with your new password soon
SUCCESS_MESSAGES.APPLICATION: Thank your for your application to Social Hackers Academy. You can now fill all the steps
SUCCESS_MESSAGES.SAVING_FORM: Your progress has been saved, you can edit it later and submit it once it's finished
SUCCESS_MESSAGES.SUBMITTING_FORM: Thank you for submitting your step, Social Hackers Academy will come back to you soon
SUCCESS_MESSAGES.LOGGED_IN: You are now logged in. You can logout when you want with the button in the top right corner

BUTTONS.SAVE: I want to leave, save my answers for later

SUMMARY_VIEW.WELCOME_DESCRIPTION: You will find in this page your current progress, you have to complete all this steps. You can do it in the order you prefer, save your answers and submit them later...

ICONS_DESCRIPTIONS.TODO_ICON_DESCRIPTION: means that you have not yet completed this step, you have to answer and submit it.
ICONS_DESCRIPTIONS.PENDING_ICON_DESCRIPTION: means that your answers are waiting a review from Social Hackers Academy, it would come soon
ICONS_DESCRIPTIONS.REJECTED_ICON_DESCRIPTION: means that unfortunately, your answer was rejected by Social Hackers Academy: you can find on your emails some remarks on it. You have to submit it again
ICONS_DESCRIPTIONS.VALIDATED_ICON_DESCRIPTION: means that your answer was accepted by Social Hackers Academy, perfect!

SUMMARY_VIEW.DEADLINE_TEXT: You have to complete all this steps before the {{ deadline }}
SUMMARY_VIEW.HELP_NOTE: If you have any question or find any bugs, don't hesitate to contact Social Hackers Academy (email, Facebook or directly in our office)
